Reference

All functions

lcvp_fuzzy_search()

Fuzzy match plant names according to the Leipzig Catalogue of Plants (LCVP)

lcvp_group_search()

Search plants by taxa or author names in the Leipzig Catalogue of Plants (LCVP)

lcvp_join()

Join two data.frames using the Leipzig Catalogue of Plants (LCVP)

lcvp_match()

Match two name lists using the Leipzig Catalogue of Plants (LCVP)

lcvp_search()

Standardize plant names according to the Leipzig Catalogue of Plants (LCVP)

lcvp_solve_dups()

Solve duplicated names by summarizing traits

lcvp_summary()

Summarize the results from lcvp_search

lcvplants-defunct LCVP read_data

Defunct functions in package lcvplants

lcvplants-package lcvplants

The Leipzig Catalogue of Vascular Plants (LCVP) - An Improved Taxonomic Reference List for All Known Vascular Plants
